Name: market for heat, district or industrial, natural gas | heat, district or industrial, natural gas | EN15804GD, U
Category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/353:Steam and air conditioning supply/3530:Steam and air conditioning supply
Description: As thermal heat is a product that can not be stored, a local market describes more accurately the reality. Quebec has been choosen as the best scale for the market as the fuels used for thermal heat in the industry are different between the canadian provinces according todata from StatCan.;Source: Table Supply and demand of primary and secondary energy in terajoules, 2009 http://www5.statcan.gc.ca/cansim/a05?lang=eng&id=1280009
